sections.header: You have a full life to live
items: Your life quality does not have to change if you treat yourself
HIV is a viral disease that cannot be cured
You can live your life to the fullest if you take pills and visit the doctor frequently
You are not alone â€“ there are experienced advisors and support networks

sections.header: You can never be too sure...
items: People who are not aware of their infection spread the virus
By not knowing your status you can infect your loved ones
Test yourself regularly at least once a year
Get yourself and your partner tested before unprotected intercourse
Always use protection when you are having casual sex
